file_content.text: Transmitting now. Weapons are silent, but I still feel the shaking. Nerves, or the cold, I don't know. I'm thankful for the quiet.
Jedi and his cronies put up a fight or run for the shadows again?
They had never faced the true power of the Empire. They have realized their mistakes.
They won't be back.
The fool had no idea who he was dealing with. He returned to the Force with my name singed into memory.
They won't be back.
You do us all proud, my lord.
My quarries never get away for long, or ever.
They won't be back.
They knew the Imperium Pride was their best hope of survival. Sadly, it wasn't enough.
They won't be back.
Best to send 'em back home in a box.
It's done. How are you holding up, Kurdest?
I'm more concerned about you.
Not a casualty 'til I can't pull a trigger. Starting to thaw, thanks.
Are you implying that I could have failed?
I think I'm insulted.
Just that the enemy's afraid of a stand-up fight.
All units--if you can hear this, move to scuttle the Imperium Pride. I never want to hear that ship fire again.
We'll recover survivors and dig in. See one of those prats in logistics; tell 'em to send us thermal gear.
